releases.name: APRA
releases.description:
Aeronautic Product Release API (APRA) provides the private sector \
greater access to core FAA data to spur more innovation in the aviation industry, \
and ultimately advance the FAA’s mission of safety in flight.  Based on stakeholder \
recommendations, this initiative’s first effort strived to provide both more data and \
better data for Aeronautical products and information. Solution Delivery developed \
and deployed web services for several aeronautical products including both information \
about those products and the ability to automatically download those products which \
satisfied one of the recommendations.
releases.disclaimerText: APRA is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
